SELECT bh.id, bh.user_id, bh.room_id, bh.browse_time, ri.id as room_id, ri.room_number, ri.rent, ai.name as apartment_name, ai.province_name, ai.city_name, ai.district_name FROM browsing_history bh LEFT JOIN room_info ri ON bh.room_id = ri.id and ri.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN apartment_info ai ON ri.apartment_id = ai.id and ai.is_deleted = 0
where bh.is_deleted = 0 and bh.user_id = #{userId} order by bh.browse_time desc
select name,url from graph_info where item_id = #{roomId} and item_type = 2
